original_text: I myself will set my face against that man and will cut him off from among his people, because he has given one of his children to Molech, to make my sanctuary unclean and to profane my holy name.
korean_text: 나도 그 사람에게 진노하여 그를 그의 백성 중에서 끊으리니 이는 그가 그의 자식을 몰렉에게 주어서 내 성소를 더럽히고 내 성호를 욕되게 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: I myself will set my face against that man
and will cut him off from among his people
because he has given one of his children to Molech
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 자기 자녀 중 하나를 몰렉에게 주었음이라

sentences.original_text: and to profane my holy name
sentences.korean_translation: 내 거룩한 이름을 욕되게 하려 함이라
